TaxonIdentification.species_authority: (Howell ex A. Gray) B. L. Robinson

treatment.description: Basal leaf blades narrowly oblanceolate, 2–10 cm. Cauline leaves markedly reduced, inter-grading with bracts; blade margins entire or eglandular-toothed. Inflorescences: basal-most bract margins entire or eglandular-toothed. Petals pale pink to pink-magenta, 7–11 mm. 2n = 30.
